underlying_goal: Execute a coordinated multi-agent architecture update task: as the 'parent-updater' teammate, load skills, wait for dependent tasks to complete, then update parent-level team.md and agent-config.yaml files to reflect a new 3-pattern architecture
friction_detail: Claude polled TaskList hundreds of times while waiting for blocked tasks to complete, consuming excessive tool calls.
brief_summary: User (via team-lead agent) instructed Claude to act as 'parent-updater' teammate, update parent-level architecture docs after dependent tasks completed; Claude successfully updated team.md and agent-config.yaml but burned hundreds of tool calls on TaskList polling.
